summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Tuesday 4 January to end of Wednesday 5 January GMT
description: Any cloud with rain or wintry showers will gradually clear east. Most parts turning sunny, however it will be feeling much colder than recent days, with brisk North winds. Maximum temperature 5 °C. <br/><br/>The brisk winds will likely ensure air pollution remains 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates. <br/><br/>With best wishes for the New Year from Imperial ERG.
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
